library("tidyverse")
library("kableExtra")
library("glue")

link_base <- '<a href="https://www.ds4ling.jvcasillas.com'
icn_r     <- '<i class="fa fa-book fa-lg"></i>'

icn_a     <- '<i class="fa fa-keyboard-o fa-lg"></i>'

syl <- list(
  wk1 = list(
    date = "Week 1: 01/23", 
    topic = "Getting started. GitHub, R, and RStudio.",

    slides = glue("{link_base}/slides/01_getting_started/\">{icn_s}</a>"), 
    pa = icn_a
  ), 
  wk2 = list(
    date = "Week 2: 01/30", 
    topic = "Distributions.",

  ), 
  wk3 = list(

  ),

  ),

    pa = icn_a
  ), 
  wk6 = list(

tribble(
